vote.title: Authorize a public hearing to be held on January 10, 2024, to receive public comments on proposed amendments to the City’s Property Assessed Clean Energy (“PACE”) Program Report which enables PACE financing of water conservation and energy-efficient improvements for private commercial, industrial, and multi-family properties within the city of Dallas pursuant to the Property Assessed Clean Energy Act, as amended (Texas Local Government Code Chapter 399) - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
vote.description: Authorize a public hearing to be held on January 10, 2024, to receive public comments on proposed amendments to the City’s Property Assessed Clean Energy (“PACE”) Program Report which enables PACE financing of water conservation and energy-efficient improvements for private commercial, industrial, and multi-family properties within the city of Dallas pursuant to the Property Assessed Clean Energy Act, as amended (Texas Local Government Code Chapter 399) - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
